title: Mobile-Based Probability Calculation Learning: Practitioner Training Using Video Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic computation skills and understanding of simple statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Focused on acquiring immediately applicable probabilistic calculation methods. Provides mobile-optimized 5-7 minute microlearning content with formative assessments for real-time comprehension checks

learning_goals: Learners can solve conditional probability calculation problems with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain three cases of applying probability concepts to workplace tasks.
Learners can write summary notes of core concepts within 5 minutes after watching video modeling content.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
